body:
INSERT INTO dbo.CRM_POS_COLLECTION_ON_BEHALF_PUSH
    (
         CRMID
       , CRMCode
       , VendorCode
       , TotalAmount
       , Fee
       , CreateDate
       , U_ShpCod
       , U_CrdCod
       , U_EplCod
       , U_Desc
       , U_MoCash
       , U_MoCCad
       , U_Acbank
       , U_CTLKCode
       , U_TypCre
       , U_NumCre
       , U_MoVoCh
       , U_NumVch
       , U_NaVoch
       , U_AcVoch
       , U_MoTran
       , U_BankTs
       , U_AccNum
       , U_AccName
       , IsAutoCard
       , Card_Fee
       , CardFeeTM
       , LongChauShopCode
       , UpdatedDate
       , PushStatus
       , POSMsg
       , POSORCT
       , MaChuanChi
       , SplitFee
       , SplitFeeType
       , mPOSDocNum
       , Status
    )
SELECT
      B.ID
	, B.ReceiptCode
	, '0002'
	, B.TotalAmount
	, 0
	, B.CreatedDateTime
	, B.WarehouseCode
	, 0
	, B.CreatedEmployeeBy
	, ''
	, P.CashAmount
	, P.CardAmount
	, P.CardPaymentMethod
	, P.U_CTLKCode
	, P.CreditCardType
	, P.CreditCardNumber
	, P.VoucherAmount
	, P.VoucherNumber
	, P.VoucherName
	, P.VoucherAccount
	, P.TransferAmount
	, P.BankCode
	, P.BankAccountNumber
	, P.BankAccountName
	, CASE WHEN P.IsAutoCard = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END
	, P.Card_Fee
	, P.Card_Fee
	, ''
	, NULL
	, 1
	, NULL
	, NULL
	, P.CreditCardNumber
	, 0
	, 0
	, NULL
	, B.CashCollectionReceiptStatus 
FROM
    dbo.CashCollectionReceipts B (NOLOCK)
		INNER JOIN dbo.POSPaymentMethod P (NOLOCK)
				ON B.ID = P.FtelBillID
		
WHERE
    B.ID IN (
$CURSOR$
);
